Hello, my name is Benimana Theophile, a final-year IT student at RP IPRC Ngoma.
I’m passionate about using technology to solve real-life problems in agriculture, education, and health.
I've worked on a machine learning model to detect plant diseases and helped develop a digital student meal management system.
I enjoy learning new tools and collaborating with others to build smart solutions.
I’m now looking for opportunities like internships or entry-level roles to grow my skills and contribute to innovative projects.
